content.description: Stick clip the first bolt (this can be done by hand from the rocks on the right) and commit to a couple of harder moves to start. Stay focused as you traverse using the wandering finger-cracks. Stem over the dihedral and perform some techy face climbing past two bolts to the anchors.
content.protection: 3 bolts. Small nuts and TCUs. Bolt hangers at the top.
content.location: Scramble up the 30' of 4th class slab to the base of Questlove. Walk right past No Love Lost.

content.description: Hanging dihedral. Start in broken cracks on left. Angle right towards bolts. Upper dihedral follows finger-pods/pin-scars in left-arching seam. Suggested grade: 13-
content.protection: Mixed. Optional gear above last bolt, but unnecessary with a soft catch.
content.location: Climb the 4th class slab for 30' to the base.

content.description: Boulder up to the first bolt making some insecure moves and a huge reach off some small edges around the roof to the up and left trending crack (crux). Continue following this crack to the anchors.
content.protection: 1 bolt. Nuts and cams up to a BD 0.5. Bolt hangers at the top.
content.location: Scramble up the 30' of 4th class slab to the base of Questlove. Walk right until you see an obvious low bolt under a roof.

content.description: South-facing, but with some corners and alcoves that may provide some shade in the warmer months. A nice variety of mainly mixed lines. Developed mainly by Paul Venuti and others from a crew from Richmond circa 2005.
